name: FastSpy Port Scanner
short_description: Fastspy is a multithreaded network port scanner. It minimizes connection idle time performing fast subnet service search, classic port range scan, hosts list scan, and also send user data over a connection to log servers response.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
